msp.title: Welcome to Lyzr Control Tower - MSP Command Center
msp.subtitle: Your complete platform for managing 47 System Integrators and 284 SMB customers
msp.overview: As an MSP Super Admin, you have full control over your partner ecosystem. Monitor revenue, allocate licenses, manage users, and scale your AI-powered business across multiple tiers.
key_benefits: Manage $89K+ monthly recurring revenue across your ecosystem
Real-time visibility into 850+ allocated licenses and utilization rates
Advanced analytics covering 1,847 users and 15,672 monthly agent calls
Predictive capacity planning and automated expansion recommendations
getting_started: Start with the Dashboard to see your ecosystem health at a glance
Use License Management to optimize allocation and identify expansion opportunities
Monitor User Activity to ensure security compliance and engagement
Review Insights for AI-powered growth recommendations
msp.success_metrics: Track ecosystem ROI (340%), partner growth (+23.5%), and license efficiency (85%)

si.title: Welcome to CloudPro Services AI Platform
si.subtitle: Your white-labeled portal for managing 35 SMB clients and growing your AI services business
si.overview: As a System Integrator, you're empowered to deliver AI solutions to your SMB clients while maintaining your brand identity. Scale your portfolio, optimize client success, and maximize your revenue potential.
key_benefits: Generate $18.7K monthly revenue with 25.2% growth rate
Manage 35 SMB clients with 91% license utilization efficiency
Deploy specialized AI agents tailored to client industry needs
Access white-label branding and custom domain configuration
getting_started: Review your Portfolio Dashboard to identify top-performing clients
Use Agent Gallery to deploy new solutions to client teams
Monitor License Usage to optimize allocation across your client base
Configure Settings for custom branding and client onboarding
si.success_metrics: Track client satisfaction (4.6/5), portfolio growth (+25.2%), and license efficiency (91%)

smb.title: Welcome to Global Dynamics AI Hub
smb.subtitle: Your team's productivity platform powered by specialized AI agents
smb.overview: Transform your 24-person team's productivity with AI-powered automation. Access specialized agents for Marketing, Finance, and Operations while tracking real-time savings and efficiency gains.
key_benefits: Achieve $12.6K monthly cost savings and 32% productivity gains
Access 6 specialized AI agents tailored to your business functions
Track team performance across Marketing, Finance, and Operations
Generate professional outputs 45% faster than manual processes
getting_started: Launch your first agent from the Agent Hub to see immediate results
Check Team Analytics to identify optimization opportunities
Review Usage Reports to track your team's productivity improvements
Invite team members and assign appropriate agent permissions
smb.success_metrics: Monitor productivity gains (32%), cost savings ($12.6K), and team adoption (22/24 active users)
